title: STOCK BOX Doll Customizing: Tamara Tinyhoof, the half art-doll Fawn/Centaur
author: Dollightful
description:
What to do with a broken, legless doll? Well, join me and find out! :D No doll is too broken to be saved, I say!
Vote for the next STOCK BOX doll! https://www.poll-maker.com/poll3804197x9b014381-118
--------------------------------------------
Artists shown in video:
@KaypeaCreations 
Errana’s World https://www.instagram.com/_n0yra_/?hl=en
Anya Boz https://www.anyabozartist.com/
Gift of Mercury https://giftofmercury.com/
--------------------------------------------
Merchandise:
https://www.zazzle.com/store/dollightful/collections
https://society6.com/dollightful
Doll clothing patterns here: https://www.etsy.com/shop/DollightfulPatterns
Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest: @dollightfully
--------------------------------------------
MATERIALS
Nylon doll hair from https://www.etsy.com/shop/TheDollPlanetHair
Yarn
#3 Needle for re-rooting, rerooting tools from https://www.etsy.com/shop/TheDollPlanetHair
Friendly Form
Coat hanger wire, 16 Ga. 2LB wire (main body), Jewelry wire
Water Colored Pencils - Faber Castell
Pastels - Mungyo Hand-Rolled Soft Pastels
Gouache cakes (paint) – Caran D’ache
Sealant - Mr. Super Clear UV Flat by Mr. Hobby (wear a mask and spray in a ventilated area!)
Mask - Organic Vapor Particle Respirator Mask
Scrap fabric, Faux Furs, thin Faux Leather
Comb + Scissors for trimming hair
Vallejo Game Air paints (mixed with thinner for the airbrush)
Acrylic paint
High Gloss Varnish -Liquitex Brand
Matte Varnish - Duraclear
Various embroidery threads, beads, and jewelry trinkets
--------------------------------------------
Musical tracks from Artlist https://artlist.io 
Busy World by Lance Conrad
Diabulera by Kaleido Sea
Open Field by Ankori Ramon
Out of the Darkness by Cameron Mackay
Skogsdrommar by BlackBard
Magic Forest by Itamar Doari
--------------------------------------------
Logo and other graphics designed by: https://charliesparksdesign.myportfolio.com/
--------------------------------------------
#artdoll #stockbox #clawdeen
